name: Klondike: Farm Adventure
description:
Enjoy Solitaire fun with Farm Adventure, the classic solitaire card game which allows you to train your brain with different solitaire puzzles.

Farm Adventure HIGHLIGHTS:
* Great graphics and amazing beautiful themes.
* 1000+ different levels, with more in later version!
* Daily exciting events and challenges, you will never get bored!
* Fill up your Streak Meter to win free BONUSES and WILD cards!
* Tri-peaks Solitaire in your hands, anytime, anywhere.

Never played Solitaire or any card games before? No worries. Farm Adventure is Easy to play! Simply complete a quick tutorial and you'll learn how to play! It's a casual, entertaining free card game for everyone to enjoy! What are you waiting for?

Download NOW and Enjoy the Solitaire Fun for FREE!

Three different subscription packages are available for Tripeaks. The first subscription is a monthly package that costs $5.99/ month and starts after a 7-day free trial. The second subscription is a quarterly package that costs $14.99/ 3 months. The third subscription is an annual package that costs $49.99/ year. When you purchase a subscription, the payment is charged to your iTunes Account after the purchase is confirmed.

Subscription Renewal: With auto-renew enabled, your Apple’s iTunes account will be automatically charged within 24 hours after your subscription expires. Once the renewal is complete, your new subscription will extend by one more subscription period. To disable automatic renewal, you must turn off auto-renew at least 24-hours before the end of your current subscription period.

Subscription Cancellation: To cancel your subscription, you must manually disable the automatic renewal feature in your iTunes/Apple ID settings. This must be disabled 24 hours before your current subscription period ends. If this is disabled within 24 hours of your subscription end period, the cancellation will not have time to take effect and your account will be charged.

To view and manage your purchased subscription settings, you can go to “Manage Subscriptions.” If you have purchased subscriptions that are still valid, you can activate them by clicking “ Restore Subscriptions.”  

You can go to your Account Settings to manage your subscription and auto-renewal settings.
